title: Deepika Padukone’s new ad with dad Prakash Padukone, watch
text: Deepika Padukone’s new ad with dad Prakash Padukone, watch Thursday, 8 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Deepika Padukone is seen sharing the special bond with her father Prakash Padukone in the new commercial of a paint company. Watch Shaandaar Shahid Kapoor, Rowdy Akshay Kumar, Gorgerous Deepika Padukone, stylish Ayushmann Khurrana in their fashionable best at the GQ Men of the Year Awards Recent related news Deepika Padukone showered big love on her dad for a commercial recently Deepika Padukone‘s special Mother’s Day advertisement for Tanishq became quite a rage...
